headline.main: Review: ‘To Pixar and Beyond’ Plumbs New Depth in Oft-Told Tale

keywords.value: To Pixar and Beyond: My Unlikely Journey With Steve Jobs to Make Entertainment History (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: Lawrence Levy tackles a long list of complex subjects that have been covered elsewhere but uses his personal story as vehicle to add a new dimension....
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Levy tackles a long list of complex subjects that have been covered elsewhere but uses his personal story as vehicle to add a new dimension.
